item.description: Let's meet at the Arnold Arboretum and walk through the park and proceed to Jamaica Pond. From there we will walk to Boston Beer Company Brewery for the First Annual Bay State Shellfish Shindig. Shellfish growers from around the state will serve oysters, quahogs and steamers by the bucket at this first annual fall fest. Each grower will sell food and boston Beer Company will provide beer. There is a $10 admission charge which includes 2 sam Adams beers. It looks to be a fun outing.

group.name: The Chestnut Hill Walking Meetup Group

item.name: CHESTNUT HILL WALKING MEETUP-BOSTON BEER BREWERY
